what: Escape special characters in text intended to go into a LaTeX document — escape_latex
title: Escape special characters in text intended to go into a LaTeX document — escape_latex
text: Escape special characters text intended go LaTeX document

title: Escape special characters in text intended to go into a LaTeX document — escape_latex
code: escape_latex(x, ...)  # S3 method for default escape_latex(x, ...)

title: Escape special characters in text intended to go into a LaTeX document — escape_latex
text: x character string escape ... Passed methods

title: Escape special characters in text intended to go into a LaTeX document — escape_latex
text: `x` LaTeX special characters escaped

title: Escape special characters in text intended to go into a LaTeX document — escape_latex
text: escape text sending function.

title: Generate a LaTeX command — latex_command
text: Generate LaTeX command

title: Generate a LaTeX command — latex_command
code: latex_command(   x,   required_args = list(),   optional_args = list(),   brace_protect = TRUE )

title: Generate a LaTeX command — latex_command
text: x contents environment, scalar vector collapsed newlines. required_args list required arguments environment, order. optional_args named list optional arguments environment, order.  error optional argument NULL prior non-optional argument. brace_protect required_args, empty braces, \{\}, added end command?

title: Generate a LaTeX command — latex_command
text: character scalar command

title: Generate a LaTeX command — latex_command
code: latex_command("newpar") #> [1] "\\newpar{}" latex_command("newpar", brace_protect=FALSE) #> [1] "\\newpar" latex_command("section", required_args="My first section") #> [1] "\\section{My first section}" latex_command("frac", required_args=list(1, 2)) #> [1] "\\frac{1}{2}"

title: Generate a LaTeX environment — latex_environment
text: Generate LaTeX environment

title: Generate a LaTeX environment — latex_environment
code: latex_environment(   x,   environment_name,   required_args = list(),   optional_args = list() )

title: Generate a LaTeX environment — latex_environment
text: x contents environment, scalar vector collapsed newlines. environment_name name environment (like "tabular" "minipage") required_args list required arguments environment, order. optional_args named list optional arguments environment, order.  error optional argument NULL prior non-optional argument.

title: Generate a LaTeX environment — latex_environment
text: character scalar environment newlines "\n"   characters embedded.

what: Generate a LaTeX minipage environment — latex_minipage
title: Generate a LaTeX minipage environment — latex_minipage
text: Generate LaTeX minipage environment

title: Generate a LaTeX minipage environment — latex_minipage
code: latex_minipage(   x,   width = NULL,   position = NULL,   height = NULL,   inner_position = NULL )

title: Generate a LaTeX minipage environment — latex_minipage
text: x text go within minipage.  See Details. width width minipage ("\columnwidth" useful choice.) position position minipage respect line appears. height (optional) height minipage inner_position position contents within minipage (available height also provided).

title: Generate a LaTeX minipage environment — latex_minipage
text: Either character scalar (x character input)   character vector (x list character vectors).

title: Generate a LaTeX minipage environment — latex_minipage
text: x character vector, text inserted   separate paragraphs (empty line ).  x list   character vectors, multiple minipages generated (via sapply).   latter useful building tables minipages, instance.

title: Generate optional arguments to a LaTeX call. — latex_optional_arg
